newsArray.title: Chelsea ya no podr√° hacer fichajes bomba por culpa de su due√±o
creator: Joel Agoitia
newsArray.description: Todd Boehly es el nuevo due√±o del Chelsea, pero la verdad es que ha gastado mucho en refuerzos y esto no le gusta nada a UEFA Muchos estaban peleando de que Manchester City y PSG gastaban una millonada en fichajes, pues a esta lista tenemos que agregar el nombre del Chelsea. Ahora que el consorcio estadounidense liderado por Todd Boehly lleg√≥ a los Blues, no tardaron mucho en reforzarse, pero lo que causa un poco de conflicto son los contratos que hacen. Esto vino hasta los o√≠dos de UEFA y ya se puso a trabajar. Seg√∫n mis cuates The Times; el organismo encargado del futbol europeo est√° pensando en poner de l√≠mite cinco a√±os para vincular a un equipo con un jugador. Con el objetivo de que otros clubes hagan lo mismo que los de Premier League. üó£ "You take that ¬£80m cost, you divide that over 8 and a half years and it works out to be just over ¬£10m a year and that appears to be the Chelsea strategy."@KieranMaguire explains how Chelsea are able to sign Mudryk and many others without breaching the FFP pic.twitter.com/hKzjBWDf0w‚Äî Football Daily (@footballdaily) January 16, 2023 TAMBI√âN TE PUEDE INTERESAR: Harry Kane y la millonada que deber√≠a pagar Manchester United por √©l Y es que en sus √∫ltimos dos fichajes, Chelsea se pas√≥ de lanza la verdad. Han gastado m√°s de 500 millones de euros, contrataron a Mykhaylo Mudryk por ocho a√±os y medio, y a Benoit Badiashile por siete a√±os y medio. El plan de los Blues Lo que la mayor√≠a de los equipos hace es vincular a sus jugadores por cinco a√±os y poner una clausula para extender su contrato, pero Todd Boehly no es as√≠. Desde que lleg√≥ este nuevo due√±o a la Premier League, han fichado a 15 cracks de los cuales nueve no tienen ni 22 a√±os. La directiva est√° buscando combinar la experiencia con la juventud para que ayuden a Graham Potter en las futuras temproadas. üó£ "The issue will be that you are restricted to a 25 man squad‚Ä¶so you can't just keep adding to the player roster." @KieranMaguire highlights the issues with the new adopted Chelsea strategy pic.twitter.com/uE2yaO7Qzy‚Äî Football Daily (@footballdaily) January 16, 2023 Sus √∫ltimos fichajes Si solo tomamos en cuenta las contrataciones de Mudryk y Badiashile, Chelsea gast√≥ 108 millones de euros. Se las pongo as√≠ juan√°ticos, solo fue una cuarta parte de lo que han desembolsado para la campa√±a 2022-23. ¬øQu√© sigue para Chelsea? Pues actualmente, los Blues no la est√°n pasando nada bien porque est√°n en el lugar 10 de la tabla, a siete puntos de puestos europeos. Su siguiente partido es contra Fulham este 3 de febrero a las 14:00 hrs. (Hora del Centro de M√©xico), en caso de ganar y con unas combinaciones se pueden ir al sexto lugar.

newsArray.title: Two weeks later, no coaching vacancy has been filled
creator: Mike Florio
newsArray.description: Three coaches were fired during the season. Two joined them on Monday, January 9. In 15 days since then, no one has made a hire. We‚Äôve seen how it happens in the past. Once the first domino falls, others follow. For now, the process generally is shifting from a broad wave of first interviews to [more]
newsArray.content: Three coaches were fired during the season. Two joined them on Monday, January 9. In 15 days since then, no one has made a hire. We‚Äôve seen how it happens in the past. Once the first domino falls, others follow. For now, the process generally is shifting from a broad wave of first interviews to a more narrow set of second interviews. Then, decisions will be made. Some ultimately may wait to make a hire until after the Super Bowl, like the Vikings did a year ago with Rams offensive coordinator Kevin O‚ÄôConnell. If someone wants 49ers defensive coordinator DeMeco Ryans, Eagles defensive coordinator Jonathan Gannon, or Chiefs offensive coordinator Eric Bieniemy, that could be the case. The biggest name in the current cycle, of course, is available to be hired at any time. And four of the five teams (Broncos, Texans, Cardinals, Panthers) have interviewed or will interview Sean Payton. It‚Äôs unknown what Payton wants. He could choose to go to the Broncos, a team that has a great fan base, a strong tradition of winning, ownership with chasm-deep pockets, and a quarterback situation that won‚Äôt be blamed on Payton if he can‚Äôt rectify things in 2023. Which basically gives him a redshirt year. Payton could end up with the Panthers, if he prefers a clean slate at quarterback ‚Äî and if owner David Tepper is willing to dig deep financially and to give the Saints the enhanced package they‚Äôll want for Payton‚Äôs rights. One real attraction in Charlotte comes from the fact that, while the AFC West is one of the best divisions in football, the NFC South currently is not. Payton also could land in Houston. That‚Äôs the closest approximation to New Orleans. A team with very limited success in 20 years of NFL football. Payton could become the same kind of hero there that he is in New Orleans. Arizona seems like a longer shot, given that they‚Äôve already hired a G.M. And there‚Äôs a lingering vibe that Brian Flores is the favorite there, especially since new General Manager Monti Ossenfort (like Flores) has Patriot Way DNA. The presence of entrenched General Managers in Denver, Charlotte, and Houston also becomes a factor. They naturally won‚Äôt want to have their status diminished, and potentially their employment jeopardized, if Payton shows up and takes over. That could give the likes of George Paton, Scott Fitterer, and Nick Caserio, respectively, an interest in trying to nudge the process away from Payton. Still, Payton is the key. Once he lands with a team, the others likely will begin to fall into place. Along the way, someone may decide to take a look at Bengals defensive coordinator Lou Anarumo, who continues to do an excellent job against some of the better offenses in the NFL. If the Bengals can neutralize Patrick Mahomes , Andy Reid, and company on Sunday at Arrowhead Stadium, maybe one of these five teams should wait until the day after the Super Bowl to bring Anarumo in for an interview.

newsArray.title: CHAN 2022 : le Niger dompte le Cameroun (0-1) et passe en quarts des finale
creator: jll
newsArray.description: Kinshasa, 24 janvier 2023 (ACP).- Le Mena du Niger a dompt√© les Lions Indomptables du Cameroun, par 1-0 et passent en quarts de finale de la 7√®me √©dition du Championnat des nations (CHAN) de football. Les Nig√©riens ont r√©ussi cet exploit, mardi, au stade Miloud Hadefi, √† Oran, en match de la 2√®me et derni√®re [‚Ä¶]
newsArray.content: Kinshasa, 24 janvier 2023 (ACP).- Le Mena du Niger a dompt√© les Lions Indomptables du Cameroun, par 1-0 et passent en quarts de finale de la 7√®me √©dition du Championnat des nations (CHAN) de football. Les Nig√©riens ont r√©ussi cet exploit, mardi, au stade Miloud Hadefi, √† Oran, en match de la 2√®me et derni√®re journ√©e du groupe E, de cette comp√©tition organis√©e, du 13 janvier au 4 f√©vrier 2023. la 7√®me √©dition Les Nig√©riens ont r√©ussi cet exploit √† la suite d‚Äôune balle arr√™t√©e ex√©cut√©e par Ousseini Badamassi (69√®me) et ont pr√©serv√© cet avantage jusqu‚Äôau dernier coup de sifflet de l‚Äôarbitre mozambicain. Les Camerounais qui ont pouss√© et ont tout donn√© avec toute l‚Äô√©nergie des moribonds n‚Äôont pu r√©ussir √† bousculer la citadelle d√©fensive du Niger rest√©e inflexible. Le coup √©tait jou√© et le Cameroun, √©ject√© de la course, est oblig√© de plier bagages. A l‚Äôissue de cette rencontre, le Niger termine en t√™te avec 4 points en 2 sorties. Le Cameroun qui a fait du surplace avec 3 points reste 2√®me du groupe E devant la lanterne rouge, le R√©publique du Congo, avec 1 point. L‚Äôespoir du nul qualificatif √©chappe au Cameroun Au coup d‚Äôenvoi de cette rencontre, les Camerounais ont 3 points dans leur besace, apr√®s leur courte victoire, de la premi√®re journ√©e, acquise le 16 janvier dernier, devant les Diables rouges du Congo (1-0). De leur c√¥t√©, les Nig√©riens n‚Äôont qu‚Äôune petite unit√© qu‚Äôils avaient obtenue le 20 du m√™me mois, lors de leur entr√©e sur la sc√®ne face aux m√™mes Diables rouges du Congo (0-0). Dans ce groupe constitu√© du Congo, d‚Äôores-et-d√©j√† √©limin√©, du Niger et du Cameroun, un nul, √† d√©faut d‚Äôun succ√®s, est amplement suffisant pour la qualification des Lions Indomptables alors que la victoire s‚Äôimpose pour le Niger. ACP/

newsArray.title: Kelleher earns Colchester a point
newsArray.description: Fiacre Kelleher came off the bench to earn Colchester a point from their 1-1 draw with promotion-chasing Salford in Sky Bet League Two.
newsArray.content: Fiacre Kelleher came off the bench to earn Colchester a point from their 1-1 draw with promotion-chasing Salford in Sky Bet League Two. The Ammies went close in the 10th minute when home goalkeeper Kieran O'Hara pushed away Matt Smith's header, following Jason Lowe's ball into the area. The visitors edged the first half but Colchester almost took the lead in first-half stoppage-time when John Akinde sent a free header straight at keeper Alex Cairns, following Noah Chilvers' ball into the six-yard box. The second half was a livelier affair and Salford took a 49th-minute lead through Conor McAleny, who nodded in from close range from Ryan Watson's assist after Theo Vassell's header from a corner had struck the crossbar. However, Colchester equalised in the 63rd minute when substitute Kelleher rose to plant a fine header from Luke Chambers' pass into the net. Arthur Read's long-range effort was pushed away by Cairns, who also brilliantly pushed away Cole Skuse's rocket for a corner in the closing stages. League Two table League Two fixtures League Two news Get Sky Sports However, the points were shared. Make yourself a millionaire with Super 6. Play for free, entries by 3pm Boxing Day.

newsArray.title: Fran S√°nchez: ¬´Mach√≠s nos puede mejorar¬ª
creator: Fabiola Sabedra
newsArray.description: El oriundo de Tucupita fue presentado este martes por el Real Villadolid La entrada Fran S√°nchez: ¬´Mach√≠s nos puede mejorar¬ª se public√≥ primero en L√≠der en deportes.
newsArray.content: El director deportivo del Real Villadolid, Fran S√°nchez ofreci√≥ declaraciones este martes sobre las posibles bajas y las nuevas incorporaciones que han a√±adido en esta ventana de fichajes. Una de esas nuevas caras es el venezolano Darw√≠n Mach√≠s. S√°nchez a√±adi√≥ ante la prensa que el extremo izquierdo puede mejorar al elenco espa√±ol en sus debilidades. ¬´Todos entend√≠amos que necesit√°bamos un poco m√°s de velocidad y potencia arriba, yo creo que Darw√≠n Mach√≠s (‚Ä¶) nos puede aportar esa caracter√≠stica¬ª. En cuanto al debut del oriundo de Tucupita S√°nchez asegur√≥ que estar√° disponible para el partido del fin de semana ante el Valencia. Hasta los momentos el jugador no est√° inscrito en La Liga. ‚ÄúEst√°n los abogados con eso, tambi√©n depende de la otra parte, que metan en tr√°nsfer en el TMS, pero estar√° disponible para el fin de semana‚Äù. Lee tambi√©n: Darwin Mach√≠s llega al Real Valladolid Mach√≠s firm√≥ contrato con el Villadollid por tres temporadas y medio, a lo que el directivo inform√≥: ‚ÄúAqu√≠ hay muchas partes, el club que traspasa al jugador, por el que ha pagado m√°s de tres millones en verano y lo firmamos a coste cero, el jugador ten√≠a un contrato all√≠ por unas cantidades que ha tenido que renunciar. Para llegar a un acuerdo tuvimos que hacerlo as√≠‚Äù. ùó¶ùó∂ ùó∞ùóøùó≤ùó≤ùó∫ùóºùòÄ ùóæùòÇùó≤ ùòÇùóª ùó∑ùòÇùó¥ùóÆùó±ùóºùóø ùóªùóºùòÄ ùóΩùòÇùó≤ùó±ùó≤ ùó∫ùó≤ùó∑ùóºùóøùóÆùóø, ùóÆùòÄùó∂ÃÅ ùóπùóº ùóµùóÆùóøùó≤ùó∫ùóºùòÄ. Escucha el resto de la rueda de prensa de @fransanchezv https://t.co/EvKw3pHNrt pic.twitter.com/s9uKk5CKdJ‚Äî Real Valladolid C.F. (@realvalladolid) January 24, 2023 Mach√≠s regres√≥ a La Liga Por otra parte, en la presentaci√≥n del internacional con la Vinotinto la figura confirm√≥ su ilusi√≥n de volver a la liguilla espa√±ola. ‚ÄúEstoy muy contento y motivado por estar de vuelta en la Liga y m√°s con el esfuerzo que hizo el club para traerme. Tengo ilusi√≥n de que el fin de semana ya pueda estar disponible para afrontar los partidos que quedan y dar una mejor versi√≥n de m√≠ y sacar esto adelante‚Äù, dijo a los periodistas presentes. El Villadolid ocupa una de las tres plazas que marcan el descenso, es por ello que el criollo har√° lo posible con sus aportes en la cancha para ganar la permanencia en primera divisi√≥n. La entrada Fran S√°nchez: ¬´Mach√≠s nos puede mejorar¬ª se public√≥ primero en L√≠der en deportes.

newsArray.title: Everton owner Moshiri puts club up for SALE for ¬£500m amid fan protests as ‚Äònumber of buyers‚Äô eye managerless Toffees
creator: Dylan Terry
newsArray.content: Everton owner Farhad Moshiri has reportedly put the club up for sale. The Toffees sacked manager Frank Lampard on Monday after a dreadful run of results has left them fighting relegation for a second successive season. PAEverton owner Farhad Moshiri has put the club up for sale after fan protests[/caption] PAEverton supporters have been calling for new ownership[/caption] Everton supporters have led numerous protests against the current ownership, calling for them to leave. According to The Guardian, Moshiri is now seeking an exit strategy after seven years in charge he looks to sell the club for more than ¬£500million. The British-Iranian businessman had been looking for outside investment, but is now open to a wholesale takeover. He is willing to accept a minority or majority sale, with a ‚Äúnumber of potential buyers‚Äù having already expressed an interest. Deloitte are reportedly set to oversee the sale of the club. Moshiri has put money up for Everton‚Äôs new stadium which is currently being built at Bramley-Moore Dock. And he is wanting to recoup that money as he plans to vacate Merseyside. The new ground is set to cost the club at least ¬£550. BETTING SPECIAL ‚Äì BEST FOOTBALL BETTING SITES IN THE UK Moshiri‚Äôs ownership have spent around ¬£700m on players but seen little success on the pitch. They have seen a host of managers come and go including Ronald Koeman, Sam Allardyce, Marco Silva, Carlo Ancelotti, Rafa Benitez and now Lampard. Former Leeds boss Marcelo Bielsa is the favourite to take over the Toffees as they bid to climb out of the relegation zone. More to follow.

newsArray.description: Xavi Simons serait susceptible de ne pas revenir au PSG de sit√¥t. Bien qu‚Äôil soit question d‚Äôune telle option dans la presse depuis quelque temps, le Paris Saint-Germain ne plancherait finalement pas‚Ä¶

newsArray.title: Real Madrid want Jude Bellingham in sensational swap transfer as they ‚Äòprepare offer of ¬£88m AND Eduardo Camavinga‚Äô
creator: Anthony Chapman
newsArray.content: REAL MADRID are reportedly desperate to sign Jude Bellingham ahead of Premier League rivals. And they are ready to offer ¬£88million AND Eduardo Camavinga in exchange for the Borussia Dortmund star this summer. Real Madrid are set to bid ¬£88m for Borussia Dortmund star Jude BellinghamGetty Real are also ready to offer Eduardo Camavinga as part of their bidRex Sky Germany claims Real chiefs are ready to make an offer their German counterparts can‚Äôt refuse as the race for Bellingham heats up. The England ace, 19, is one of Europe‚Äôs most sought-after players after an outstanding World Cup campaign. And Bellingham is being chased by almost all of the Premier League‚Äôs top sides to spark a major summer transfer scramble. However, Real believe they can land the teen as long as they can persuade Dortmund into accepting an offer. The Spanish champs can‚Äôt afford the reported ¬£135m price-tag, having already committed to a ¬£60m deal for 16-year-old Brazilian winger Endrick. So Real are instead plotting to bid a tasty ¬£88m fee while also handing over Camavinga in exchange. Like Bellingham, the 20-year-old France international is rated as one of the continent‚Äôs top young midfielders. However, it appears Real see Bellingham as the better long-term prospect for their ambitions. HOW TO GET FREE BETS ON FOOTBALL And they are reportedly ready to sacrifice Camavinga to get a deal over the line. The tempting swap-plus-cash proposal could be enough to twist Dortmund‚Äôs arm. It would firstly provide the Bundesliga side with an immediate like-for-like replacement. And they would also have a stunning amount of money to significantly strengthen several other areas of their squad. Most importantly, Camavinga is apparently open to the idea as well after struggling for minutes at Real this season. And on the other side of the deal, it would take a lot to dissuade Bellingham from linking up with fellow young icons like Vinicius Jr and Aurelien Tchouameni.

newsArray.title: Southampton 0-0 Newcastle LIVE: Carabao Cup semi-final clash underway as in-form Magpies and struggling Saints aim to boost chances of reaching Wembley
creator: Jack Johnson
newsArray.content: Newcastle travel to the south coast tonight to face Southampton with dreams of making it to Wembley. The Magpies haven‚Äôt been in a domestic cup final since the 1998/99 campaign, but playing the Saints over a two-legged Carabao Cup semi-final looks like a brilliant chance to end that run. The Toon have the best defensive record in the top-flight and Nick Pope hasn‚Äôt conceded a goal in his last nine games. Meanwhile, Southampton appear to have hit a bit of form under Nathan Jones and have won three of their last four as they look to return to Wembley. The Saints reached the 2016/17 Carabao Cup final but were beaten 3-2 by Manchester United. Carabao Cup semi-final first leg to kick-off at 8pm. Southampton XI: Bazunu, Walker-Peters, Lyanco, Caleta-Car, Salisu, Diallo, Alcaraz, Ward-Prowse, Djenepo, Orsic, Mara.Subs: Caballero, Bednarek, Perraud, Lavia, Maitland-Niles, Edozie, Elyounoussi, Armstrong, Adams.Newcastle XI: Pope, Trippier, Schar, Botman, Burn, Guimaraes, Longstaff, Willock, Almiron, Joelinton, Wilson.Subs: Darlow, Lascelles, Saint-Maximin, Ritchie, Lewis, Isak, Manquillo, Murphy, Anderson.talkSPORT will have live coverage from the south coast.Commentary will come from Jim Proudfoot and former West Ham forward Dean Ashton. Follow our live match blog below for regular updates‚Ä¶

Han gastado m√°s de 500 millones de euros, contrataron a Mykhaylo Mudryk por ocho a√±os y medio, y a Benoit Badiashile por siete a√±os y medio. El plan de los Blues Lo que la mayor√≠a de los equipos hace es vincular a sus jugadores por cinco a√±os y poner una clausula para extender su contrato, pero Todd Boehly no es as√≠. Desde que lleg√≥ este nuevo due√±o a la Premier League , han fichado a 15 cracks de los cuales nueve no tienen ni 22 a√±os. La directiva est√° buscando combinar la experiencia con la juventud para que ayuden a Graham Potter en las futuras temproadas. Sus √∫ltimos fichajes Si solo tomamos en cuenta las contrataciones de Mudryk y Badiashile , Chelsea gast√≥ 108 millones de euros. Se las pongo as√≠ juan√°ticos, solo fue una cuarta parte de lo que han desembolsado para la campa√±a 2022-23. ¬øQu√© sigue para Chelsea? Pues actualmente, los Blues no la est√°n pasando nada bien porque est√°n en el lugar 10 de la tabla, a siete puntos de puestos europeos. Su siguiente partido es contra Fulham este 3 de febrero a las 14:00 hrs. (Hora del Centro de M√©xico), en caso de ganar y con unas combinaciones se pueden ir al sexto lugar.

newsArray.title: Two weeks later, no coaching vacancy has been filled
creator: Mike Florio
newsArray.description: Three coaches were fired during the season. Two joined them on Monday, January 9. In 15 days since then, no one has made a hire. We‚Äôve seen how it happens in the past. Once the first domino falls, others follow. For now, the process generally is shifting from a broad wave of first interviews to [more]
newsArray.content: Three coaches were fired during the season. Two joined them on Monday, January 9. In 15 days since then, no one has made a hire. We‚Äôve seen how it happens in the past. Once the first domino falls, others follow. For now, the process generally is shifting from a broad wave of first interviews to a more narrow set of second interviews. Then, decisions will be made. Some ultimately may wait to make a hire until after the Super Bowl, like the Vikings did a year ago with Rams offensive coordinator Kevin O‚ÄôConnell. If someone wants 49ers defensive coordinator DeMeco Ryans, Eagles defensive coordinator Jonathan Gannon, or Chiefs offensive coordinator Eric Bieniemy, that could be the case. The biggest name in the current cycle, of course, is available to be hired at any time. And four of the five teams (Broncos, Texans, Cardinals, Panthers) have interviewed or will interview Sean Payton. It‚Äôs unknown what Payton wants. He could choose to go to the Broncos, a team that has a great fan base, a strong tradition of winning, ownership with chasm-deep pockets, and a quarterback situation that won‚Äôt be blamed on Payton if he can‚Äôt rectify things in 2023. Which basically gives him a redshirt year. Payton could end up with the Panthers, if he prefers a clean slate at quarterback ‚Äî and if owner David Tepper is willing to dig deep financially and to give the Saints the enhanced package they‚Äôll want for Payton‚Äôs rights. One real attraction in Charlotte comes from the fact that, while the AFC West is one of the best divisions in football, the NFC South currently is not. Payton also could land in Houston. That‚Äôs the closest approximation to New Orleans. A team with very limited success in 20 years of NFL football. Payton could become the same kind of hero there that he is in New Orleans. Arizona seems like a longer shot, given that they‚Äôve already hired a G.M. And there‚Äôs a lingering vibe that Brian Flores is the favorite there, especially since new General Manager Monti Ossenfort (like Flores) has Patriot Way DNA. The presence of entrenched General Managers in Denver, Charlotte, and Houston also becomes a factor. They naturally won‚Äôt want to have their status diminished, and potentially their employment jeopardized, if Payton shows up and takes over. That could give the likes of George Paton, Scott Fitterer, and Nick Caserio, respectively, an interest in trying to nudge the process away from Payton. Still, Payton is the key. Once he lands with a team, the others likely will begin to fall into place. Along the way, someone may decide to take a look at Bengals defensive coordinator Lou Anarumo, who continues to do an excellent job against some of the better offenses in the NFL. If the Bengals can neutralize Patrick Mahomes , Andy Reid, and company on Sunday at Arrowhead Stadium, maybe one of these five teams should wait until the day after the Super Bowl to bring Anarumo in for an interview.

newsArray.title: CHAN 2022 : le Niger dompte le Cameroun (0-1) et passe en quarts des finale
creator: jll
newsArray.description: Kinshasa, 24 janvier 2023 (ACP).- Le Mena du Niger a dompt√© les Lions Indomptables du Cameroun, par 1-0 et passent en quarts de finale de la 7√®me √©dition du Championnat des nations (CHAN) de football. Les Nig√©riens ont r√©ussi cet exploit, mardi, au stade Miloud Hadefi, √† Oran, en match de la 2√®me et derni√®re [‚Ä¶]
newsArray.content: Kinshasa, 24 janvier 2023 (ACP).- Le Mena du Niger a dompt√© les Lions Indomptables du Cameroun, par 1-0 et passent en quarts de finale de la 7√®me √©dition du Championnat des nations (CHAN) de football. Les Nig√©riens ont r√©ussi cet exploit, mardi, au stade Miloud Hadefi, √† Oran, en match de la 2√®me et derni√®re journ√©e du groupe E, de cette comp√©tition organis√©e, du 13 janvier au 4 f√©vrier 2023. la 7√®me √©dition Les Nig√©riens ont r√©ussi cet exploit √† la suite d‚Äôune balle arr√™t√©e ex√©cut√©e par Ousseini Badamassi (69√®me) et ont pr√©serv√© cet avantage jusqu‚Äôau dernier coup de sifflet de l‚Äôarbitre mozambicain. Les Camerounais qui ont pouss√© et ont tout donn√© avec toute l‚Äô√©nergie des moribonds n‚Äôont pu r√©ussir √† bousculer la citadelle d√©fensive du Niger rest√©e inflexible. Le coup √©tait jou√© et le Cameroun, √©ject√© de la course, est oblig√© de plier bagages. A l‚Äôissue de cette rencontre, le Niger termine en t√™te avec 4 points en 2 sorties. Le Cameroun qui a fait du surplace avec 3 points reste 2√®me du groupe E devant la lanterne rouge, le R√©publique du Congo, avec 1 point. L‚Äôespoir du nul qualificatif √©chappe au Cameroun Au coup d‚Äôenvoi de cette rencontre, les Camerounais ont 3 points dans leur besace, apr√®s leur courte victoire, de la premi√®re journ√©e, acquise le 16 janvier dernier, devant les Diables rouges du Congo (1-0). De leur c√¥t√©, les Nig√©riens n‚Äôont qu‚Äôune petite unit√© qu‚Äôils avaient obtenue le 20 du m√™me mois, lors de leur entr√©e sur la sc√®ne face aux m√™mes Diables rouges du Congo (0-0). Dans ce groupe constitu√© du Congo, d‚Äôores-et-d√©j√† √©limin√©, du Niger et du Cameroun, un nul, √† d√©faut d‚Äôun succ√®s, est amplement suffisant pour la qualification des Lions Indomptables alors que la victoire s‚Äôimpose pour le Niger. ACP/

newsArray.title: Kelleher earns Colchester a point
newsArray.description: Fiacre Kelleher came off the bench to earn Colchester a point from their 1-1 draw with promotion-chasing Salford in Sky Bet League Two.
newsArray.content: Fiacre Kelleher came off the bench to earn Colchester a point from their 1-1 draw with promotion-chasing Salford in Sky Bet League Two. The Ammies went close in the 10th minute when home goalkeeper Kieran O'Hara pushed away Matt Smith's header, following Jason Lowe's ball into the area. The visitors edged the first half but Colchester almost took the lead in first-half stoppage-time when John Akinde sent a free header straight at keeper Alex Cairns, following Noah Chilvers' ball into the six-yard box. The second half was a livelier affair and Salford took a 49th-minute lead through Conor McAleny, who nodded in from close range from Ryan Watson's assist after Theo Vassell's header from a corner had struck the crossbar. However, Colchester equalised in the 63rd minute when substitute Kelleher rose to plant a fine header from Luke Chambers' pass into the net. Arthur Read's long-range effort was pushed away by Cairns, who also brilliantly pushed away Cole Skuse's rocket for a corner in the closing stages. League Two table League Two fixtures League Two news Get Sky Sports However, the points were shared. Make yourself a millionaire with Super 6. Play for free, entries by 3pm Boxing Day.

newsArray.title: Fran S√°nchez: ¬´Mach√≠s nos puede mejorar¬ª
creator: Fabiola Sabedra
newsArray.description: El oriundo de Tucupita fue presentado este martes por el Real Villadolid La entrada Fran S√°nchez: ¬´Mach√≠s nos puede mejorar¬ª se public√≥ primero en L√≠der en deportes.
newsArray.content: El director deportivo del Real Villadolid, Fran S√°nchez ofreci√≥ declaraciones este martes sobre las posibles bajas y las nuevas incorporaciones que han a√±adido en esta ventana de fichajes. Una de esas nuevas caras es el venezolano Darw√≠n Mach√≠s. S√°nchez a√±adi√≥ ante la prensa que el extremo izquierdo puede mejorar al elenco espa√±ol en sus debilidades. ¬´Todos entend√≠amos que necesit√°bamos un poco m√°s de velocidad y potencia arriba, yo creo que Darw√≠n Mach√≠s (‚Ä¶) nos puede aportar esa caracter√≠stica¬ª. En cuanto al debut del oriundo de Tucupita S√°nchez asegur√≥ que estar√° disponible para el partido del fin de semana ante el Valencia. Hasta los momentos el jugador no est√° inscrito en La Liga. ‚ÄúEst√°n los abogados con eso, tambi√©n depende de la otra parte, que metan en tr√°nsfer en el TMS, pero estar√° disponible para el fin de semana‚Äù. Lee tambi√©n: Darwin Mach√≠s llega al Real Valladolid Mach√≠s firm√≥ contrato con el Villadollid por tres temporadas y medio, a lo que el directivo inform√≥: ‚ÄúAqu√≠ hay muchas partes, el club que traspasa al jugador, por el que ha pagado m√°s de tres millones en verano y lo firmamos a coste cero, el jugador ten√≠a un contrato all√≠ por unas cantidades que ha tenido que renunciar. Para llegar a un acuerdo tuvimos que hacerlo as√≠‚Äù. ùó¶ùó∂ ùó∞ùóøùó≤ùó≤ùó∫ùóºùòÄ ùóæùòÇùó≤ ùòÇùóª ùó∑ùòÇùó¥ùóÆùó±ùóºùóø ùóªùóºùòÄ ùóΩùòÇùó≤ùó±ùó≤ ùó∫ùó≤ùó∑ùóºùóøùóÆùóø, ùóÆùòÄùó∂ÃÅ ùóπùóº ùóµùóÆùóøùó≤ùó∫ùóºùòÄ. Escucha el resto de la rueda de prensa de @fransanchezv https://t.co/EvKw3pHNrt pic.twitter.com/s9uKk5CKdJ‚Äî Real Valladolid C.F. (@realvalladolid) January 24, 2023 Mach√≠s regres√≥ a La Liga Por otra parte, en la presentaci√≥n del internacional con la Vinotinto la figura confirm√≥ su ilusi√≥n de volver a la liguilla espa√±ola. ‚ÄúEstoy muy contento y motivado por estar de vuelta en la Liga y m√°s con el esfuerzo que hizo el club para traerme. Tengo ilusi√≥n de que el fin de semana ya pueda estar disponible para afrontar los partidos que quedan y dar una mejor versi√≥n de m√≠ y sacar esto adelante‚Äù, dijo a los periodistas presentes. El Villadolid ocupa una de las tres plazas que marcan el descenso, es por ello que el criollo har√° lo posible con sus aportes en la cancha para ganar la permanencia en primera divisi√≥n. La entrada Fran S√°nchez: ¬´Mach√≠s nos puede mejorar¬ª se public√≥ primero en L√≠der en deportes.

newsArray.title: Everton owner Moshiri puts club up for SALE for ¬£500m amid fan protests as ‚Äònumber of buyers‚Äô eye managerless Toffees
creator: Dylan Terry
newsArray.content: Everton owner Farhad Moshiri has reportedly put the club up for sale. The Toffees sacked manager Frank Lampard on Monday after a dreadful run of results has left them fighting relegation for a second successive season. PAEverton owner Farhad Moshiri has put the club up for sale after fan protests[/caption] PAEverton supporters have been calling for new ownership[/caption] Everton supporters have led numerous protests against the current ownership, calling for them to leave. According to The Guardian, Moshiri is now seeking an exit strategy after seven years in charge he looks to sell the club for more than ¬£500million. The British-Iranian businessman had been looking for outside investment, but is now open to a wholesale takeover. He is willing to accept a minority or majority sale, with a ‚Äúnumber of potential buyers‚Äù having already expressed an interest. Deloitte are reportedly set to oversee the sale of the club. Moshiri has put money up for Everton‚Äôs new stadium which is currently being built at Bramley-Moore Dock. And he is wanting to recoup that money as he plans to vacate Merseyside. The new ground is set to cost the club at least ¬£550. BETTING SPECIAL ‚Äì BEST FOOTBALL BETTING SITES IN THE UK Moshiri‚Äôs ownership have spent around ¬£700m on players but seen little success on the pitch. They have seen a host of managers come and go including Ronald Koeman, Sam Allardyce, Marco Silva, Carlo Ancelotti, Rafa Benitez and now Lampard. Former Leeds boss Marcelo Bielsa is the favourite to take over the Toffees as they bid to climb out of the relegation zone. More to follow.

newsArray.title: Une p√©pite de retour au PSG, le Qatar a tranch√©
newsArray.description: Xavi Simons serait susceptible de ne pas revenir au PSG de sit√¥t. Bien qu‚Äôil soit question d‚Äôune telle option dans la presse depuis quelque temps, le Paris Saint-Germain ne plancherait finalement pas‚Ä¶

newsArray.title: Real Madrid want Jude Bellingham in sensational swap transfer as they ‚Äòprepare offer of ¬£88m AND Eduardo Camavinga‚Äô
creator: Anthony Chapman
newsArray.content: REAL MADRID are reportedly desperate to sign Jude Bellingham ahead of Premier League rivals. And they are ready to offer ¬£88million AND Eduardo Camavinga in exchange for the Borussia Dortmund star this summer. Real Madrid are set to bid ¬£88m for Borussia Dortmund star Jude BellinghamGetty Real are also ready to offer Eduardo Camavinga as part of their bidRex Sky Germany claims Real chiefs are ready to make an offer their German counterparts can‚Äôt refuse as the race for Bellingham heats up. The England ace, 19, is one of Europe‚Äôs most sought-after players after an outstanding World Cup campaign. And Bellingham is being chased by almost all of the Premier League‚Äôs top sides to spark a major summer transfer scramble. However, Real believe they can land the teen as long as they can persuade Dortmund into accepting an offer. The Spanish champs can‚Äôt afford the reported ¬£135m price-tag, having already committed to a ¬£60m deal for 16-year-old Brazilian winger Endrick. So Real are instead plotting to bid a tasty ¬£88m fee while also handing over Camavinga in exchange. Like Bellingham, the 20-year-old France international is rated as one of the continent‚Äôs top young midfielders. However, it appears Real see Bellingham as the better long-term prospect for their ambitions. HOW TO GET FREE BETS ON FOOTBALL And they are reportedly ready to sacrifice Camavinga to get a deal over the line. The tempting swap-plus-cash proposal could be enough to twist Dortmund‚Äôs arm. It would firstly provide the Bundesliga side with an immediate like-for-like replacement. And they would also have a stunning amount of money to significantly strengthen several other areas of their squad. Most importantly, Camavinga is apparently open to the idea as well after struggling for minutes at Real this season. And on the other side of the deal, it would take a lot to dissuade Bellingham from linking up with fellow young icons like Vinicius Jr and Aurelien Tchouameni.

newsArray.title: Southampton 0-0 Newcastle LIVE: Carabao Cup semi-final clash underway as in-form Magpies and struggling Saints aim to boost chances of reaching Wembley
creator: Jack Johnson
newsArray.content: Newcastle travel to the south coast tonight to face Southampton with dreams of making it to Wembley. The Magpies haven‚Äôt been in a domestic cup final since the 1998/99 campaign, but playing the Saints over a two-legged Carabao Cup semi-final looks like a brilliant chance to end that run. The Toon have the best defensive record in the top-flight and Nick Pope hasn‚Äôt conceded a goal in his last nine games. Meanwhile, Southampton appear to have hit a bit of form under Nathan Jones and have won three of their last four as they look to return to Wembley. The Saints reached the 2016/17 Carabao Cup final but were beaten 3-2 by Manchester United. Carabao Cup semi-final first leg to kick-off at 8pm. Southampton XI: Bazunu, Walker-Peters, Lyanco, Caleta-Car, Salisu, Diallo, Alcaraz, Ward-Prowse, Djenepo, Orsic, Mara.Subs: Caballero, Bednarek, Perraud, Lavia, Maitland-Niles, Edozie, Elyounoussi, Armstrong, Adams.Newcastle XI: Pope, Trippier, Schar, Botman, Burn, Guimaraes, Longstaff, Willock, Almiron, Joelinton, Wilson.Subs: Darlow, Lascelles, Saint-Maximin, Ritchie, Lewis, Isak, Manquillo, Murphy, Anderson.talkSPORT will have live coverage from the south coast.Commentary will come from Jim Proudfoot and former West Ham forward Dean Ashton. Follow our live match blog below for regular updates‚Ä¶

newsArray.title: Chelsea ya no podr√° hacer fichajes bomba por culpa de su due√±o
creator: Joel Agoitia
newsArray.description: Todd Boehly es el nuevo due√±o del Chelsea, pero la verdad es que ha gastado mucho en refuerzos y esto no le gusta nada a UEFA Muchos estaban peleando de que Manchester City y PSG gastaban una millonada en fichajes, pues a esta lista tenemos que agregar el nombre del Chelsea. Ahora que el consorcio estadounidense liderado por Todd Boehly lleg√≥ a los Blues, no tardaron mucho en reforzarse, pero lo que causa un poco de conflicto son los contratos que hacen. Esto vino hasta los o√≠dos de UEFA y ya se puso a trabajar. Seg√∫n mis cuates The Times; el organismo encargado del futbol europeo est√° pensando en poner de l√≠mite cinco a√±os para vincular a un equipo con un jugador. Con el objetivo de que otros clubes hagan lo mismo que los de Premier League. üó£ "You take that ¬£80m cost, you divide that over 8 and a half years and it works out to be just over ¬£10m a year and that appears to be the Chelsea strategy."@KieranMaguire explains how Chelsea are able to sign Mudryk and many others without breaching the FFP pic.twitter.com/hKzjBWDf0w‚Äî Football Daily (@footballdaily) January 16, 2023 TAMBI√âN TE PUEDE INTERESAR: Harry Kane y la millonada que deber√≠a pagar Manchester United por √©l Y es que en sus √∫ltimos dos fichajes, Chelsea se pas√≥ de lanza la verdad. Han gastado m√°s de 500 millones de euros, contrataron a Mykhaylo Mudryk por ocho a√±os y medio, y a Benoit Badiashile por siete a√±os y medio. El plan de los Blues Lo que la mayor√≠a de los equipos hace es vincular a sus jugadores por cinco a√±os y poner una clausula para extender su contrato, pero Todd Boehly no es as√≠. Desde que lleg√≥ este nuevo due√±o a la Premier League, han fichado a 15 cracks de los cuales nueve no tienen ni 22 a√±os. La directiva est√° buscando combinar la experiencia con la juventud para que ayuden a Graham Potter en las futuras temproadas. üó£ "The issue will be that you are restricted to a 25 man squad‚Ä¶so you can't just keep adding to the player roster." @KieranMaguire highlights the issues with the new adopted Chelsea strategy pic.twitter.com/uE2yaO7Qzy‚Äî Football Daily (@footballdaily) January 16, 2023 Sus √∫ltimos fichajes Si solo tomamos en cuenta las contrataciones de Mudryk y Badiashile, Chelsea gast√≥ 108 millones de euros. Se las pongo as√≠ juan√°ticos, solo fue una cuarta parte de lo que han desembolsado para la campa√±a 2022-23. ¬øQu√© sigue para Chelsea? Pues actualmente, los Blues no la est√°n pasando nada bien porque est√°n en el lugar 10 de la tabla, a siete puntos de puestos europeos. Su siguiente partido es contra Fulham este 3 de febrero a las 14:00 hrs. (Hora del Centro de M√©xico), en caso de ganar y con unas combinaciones se pueden ir al sexto lugar.

newsArray.content: Three coaches were fired during the season. Two joined them on Monday, January 9. In 15 days since then, no one has made a hire. We‚Äôve seen how it happens in the past. Once the first domino falls, others follow. For now, the process generally is shifting from a broad wave of first interviews to a more narrow set of second interviews. Then, decisions will be made. Some ultimately may wait to make a hire until after the Super Bowl, like the Vikings did a year ago with Rams offensive coordinator Kevin O‚ÄôConnell. If someone wants 49ers defensive coordinator DeMeco Ryans, Eagles defensive coordinator Jonathan Gannon, or Chiefs offensive coordinator Eric Bieniemy, that could be the case. The biggest name in the current cycle, of course, is available to be hired at any time. And four of the five teams (Broncos, Texans, Cardinals, Panthers) have interviewed or will interview Sean Payton. It‚Äôs unknown what Payton wants. He could choose to go to the Broncos, a team that has a great fan base, a strong tradition of winning, ownership with chasm-deep pockets, and a quarterback situation that won‚Äôt be blamed on Payton if he can‚Äôt rectify things in 2023. Which basically gives him a redshirt year. Payton could end up with the Panthers, if he prefers a clean slate at quarterback ‚Äî and if owner David Tepper is willing to dig deep financially and to give the Saints the enhanced package they‚Äôll want for Payton‚Äôs rights. One real attraction in Charlotte comes from the fact that, while the AFC West is one of the best divisions in football, the NFC South currently is not. Payton also could land in Houston. That‚Äôs the closest approximation to New Orleans. A team with very limited success in 20 years of NFL football. Payton could become the same kind of hero there that he is in New Orleans. Arizona seems like a longer shot, given that they‚Äôve already hired a G.M. And there‚Äôs a lingering vibe that Brian Flores is the favorite there, especially since new General Manager Monti Ossenfort (like Flores) has Patriot Way DNA. The presence of entrenched General Managers in Denver, Charlotte, and Houston also becomes a factor. They naturally won‚Äôt want to have their status diminished, and potentially their employment jeopardized, if Payton shows up and takes over. That could give the likes of George Paton, Scott Fitterer, and Nick Caserio, respectively, an interest in trying to nudge the process away from Payton. Still, Payton is the key. Once he lands with a team, the others likely will begin to fall into place. Along the way, someone may decide to take a look at Bengals defensive coordinator Lou Anarumo, who continues to do an excellent job against some of the better offenses in the NFL. If the Bengals can neutralize Patrick Mahomes , Andy Reid, and company on Sunday at Arrowhead Stadium, maybe one of these five teams should wait until the day after the Super Bowl to bring Anarumo in for an interview.

newsArray.title: CHAN 2022 : le Niger dompte le Cameroun (0-1) et passe en quarts des finale
creator: jll
newsArray.description: Kinshasa, 24 janvier 2023 (ACP).- Le Mena du Niger a dompt√© les Lions Indomptables du Cameroun, par 1-0 et passent en quarts de finale de la 7√®me √©dition du Championnat des nations (CHAN) de football. Les Nig√©riens ont r√©ussi cet exploit, mardi, au stade Miloud Hadefi, √† Oran, en match de la 2√®me et derni√®re [‚Ä¶]
newsArray.content: Kinshasa, 24 janvier 2023 (ACP).- Le Mena du Niger a dompt√© les Lions Indomptables du Cameroun, par 1-0 et passent en quarts de finale de la 7√®me √©dition du Championnat des nations (CHAN) de football. Les Nig√©riens ont r√©ussi cet exploit, mardi, au stade Miloud Hadefi, √† Oran, en match de la 2√®me et derni√®re journ√©e du groupe E, de cette comp√©tition organis√©e, du 13 janvier au 4 f√©vrier 2023. la 7√®me √©dition Les Nig√©riens ont r√©ussi cet exploit √† la suite d‚Äôune balle arr√™t√©e ex√©cut√©e par Ousseini Badamassi (69√®me) et ont pr√©serv√© cet avantage jusqu‚Äôau dernier coup de sifflet de l‚Äôarbitre mozambicain. Les Camerounais qui ont pouss√© et ont tout donn√© avec toute l‚Äô√©nergie des moribonds n‚Äôont pu r√©ussir √† bousculer la citadelle d√©fensive du Niger rest√©e inflexible. Le coup √©tait jou√© et le Cameroun, √©ject√© de la course, est oblig√© de plier bagages. A l‚Äôissue de cette rencontre, le Niger termine en t√™te avec 4 points en 2 sorties. Le Cameroun qui a fait du surplace avec 3 points reste 2√®me du groupe E devant la lanterne rouge, le R√©publique du Congo, avec 1 point. L‚Äôespoir du nul qualificatif √©chappe au Cameroun Au coup d‚Äôenvoi de cette rencontre, les Camerounais ont 3 points dans leur besace, apr√®s leur courte victoire, de la premi√®re journ√©e, acquise le 16 janvier dernier, devant les Diables rouges du Congo (1-0). De leur c√¥t√©, les Nig√©riens n‚Äôont qu‚Äôune petite unit√© qu‚Äôils avaient obtenue le 20 du m√™me mois, lors de leur entr√©e sur la sc√®ne face aux m√™mes Diables rouges du Congo (0-0). Dans ce groupe constitu√© du Congo, d‚Äôores-et-d√©j√† √©limin√©, du Niger et du Cameroun, un nul, √† d√©faut d‚Äôun succ√®s, est amplement suffisant pour la qualification des Lions Indomptables alors que la victoire s‚Äôimpose pour le Niger. ACP/

newsArray.title: Kelleher earns Colchester a point
newsArray.description: Fiacre Kelleher came off the bench to earn Colchester a point from their 1-1 draw with promotion-chasing Salford in Sky Bet League Two.
newsArray.content: Fiacre Kelleher came off the bench to earn Colchester a point from their 1-1 draw with promotion-chasing Salford in Sky Bet League Two. The Ammies went close in the 10th minute when home goalkeeper Kieran O'Hara pushed away Matt Smith's header, following Jason Lowe's ball into the area. The visitors edged the first half but Colchester almost took the lead in first-half stoppage-time when John Akinde sent a free header straight at keeper Alex Cairns, following Noah Chilvers' ball into the six-yard box. The second half was a livelier affair and Salford took a 49th-minute lead through Conor McAleny, who nodded in from close range from Ryan Watson's assist after Theo Vassell's header from a corner had struck the crossbar. However, Colchester equalised in the 63rd minute when substitute Kelleher rose to plant a fine header from Luke Chambers' pass into the net. Arthur Read's long-range effort was pushed away by Cairns, who also brilliantly pushed away Cole Skuse's rocket for a corner in the closing stages. League Two table League Two fixtures League Two news Get Sky Sports However, the points were shared. Make yourself a millionaire with Super 6. Play for free, entries by 3pm Boxing Day.

newsArray.content: El director deportivo del Real Villadolid, Fran S√°nchez ofreci√≥ declaraciones este martes sobre las posibles bajas y las nuevas incorporaciones que han a√±adido en esta ventana de fichajes. Una de esas nuevas caras es el venezolano Darw√≠n Mach√≠s. S√°nchez a√±adi√≥ ante la prensa que el extremo izquierdo puede mejorar al elenco espa√±ol en sus debilidades. ¬´Todos entend√≠amos que necesit√°bamos un poco m√°s de velocidad y potencia arriba, yo creo que Darw√≠n Mach√≠s (‚Ä¶) nos puede aportar esa caracter√≠stica¬ª. En cuanto al debut del oriundo de Tucupita S√°nchez asegur√≥ que estar√° disponible para el partido del fin de semana ante el Valencia. Hasta los momentos el jugador no est√° inscrito en La Liga. ‚ÄúEst√°n los abogados con eso, tambi√©n depende de la otra parte, que metan en tr√°nsfer en el TMS, pero estar√° disponible para el fin de semana‚Äù. Lee tambi√©n: Darwin Mach√≠s llega al Real Valladolid Mach√≠s firm√≥ contrato con el Villadollid por tres temporadas y medio, a lo que el directivo inform√≥: ‚ÄúAqu√≠ hay muchas partes, el club que traspasa al jugador, por el que ha pagado m√°s de tres millones en verano y lo firmamos a coste cero, el jugador ten√≠a un contrato all√≠ por unas cantidades que ha tenido que renunciar. Para llegar a un acuerdo tuvimos que hacerlo as√≠‚Äù. ùó¶ùó∂ ùó∞ùóøùó≤ùó≤ùó∫ùóºùòÄ ùóæùòÇùó≤ ùòÇùóª ùó∑ùòÇùó¥ùóÆùó±ùóºùóø ùóªùóºùòÄ ùóΩùòÇùó≤ùó±ùó≤ ùó∫ùó≤ùó∑ùóºùóøùóÆùóø, ùóÆùòÄùó∂ÃÅ ùóπùóº ùóµùóÆùóøùó≤ùó∫ùóºùòÄ. Escucha el resto de la rueda de prensa de @fransanchezv https://t.co/EvKw3pHNrt pic.twitter.com/s9uKk5CKdJ‚Äî Real Valladolid C.F. (@realvalladolid) January 24, 2023 Mach√≠s regres√≥ a La Liga Por otra parte, en la presentaci√≥n del internacional con la Vinotinto la figura confirm√≥ su ilusi√≥n de volver a la liguilla espa√±ola. ‚ÄúEstoy muy contento y motivado por estar de vuelta en la Liga y m√°s con el esfuerzo que hizo el club para traerme. Tengo ilusi√≥n de que el fin de semana ya pueda estar disponible para afrontar los partidos que quedan y dar una mejor versi√≥n de m√≠ y sacar esto adelante‚Äù, dijo a los periodistas presentes. El Villadolid ocupa una de las tres plazas que marcan el descenso, es por ello que el criollo har√° lo posible con sus aportes en la cancha para ganar la permanencia en primera divisi√≥n. La entrada Fran S√°nchez: ¬´Mach√≠s nos puede mejorar¬ª se public√≥ primero en L√≠der en deportes.

newsArray.title: Everton owner Moshiri puts club up for SALE for ¬£500m amid fan protests as ‚Äònumber of buyers‚Äô eye managerless Toffees
creator: Dylan Terry
newsArray.content: Everton owner Farhad Moshiri has reportedly put the club up for sale. The Toffees sacked manager Frank Lampard on Monday after a dreadful run of results has left them fighting relegation for a second successive season. PAEverton owner Farhad Moshiri has put the club up for sale after fan protests[/caption] PAEverton supporters have been calling for new ownership[/caption] Everton supporters have led numerous protests against the current ownership, calling for them to leave. According to The Guardian, Moshiri is now seeking an exit strategy after seven years in charge he looks to sell the club for more than ¬£500million. The British-Iranian businessman had been looking for outside investment, but is now open to a wholesale takeover. He is willing to accept a minority or majority sale, with a ‚Äúnumber of potential buyers‚Äù having already expressed an interest. Deloitte are reportedly set to oversee the sale of the club. Moshiri has put money up for Everton‚Äôs new stadium which is currently being built at Bramley-Moore Dock. And he is wanting to recoup that money as he plans to vacate Merseyside. The new ground is set to cost the club at least ¬£550. BETTING SPECIAL ‚Äì BEST FOOTBALL BETTING SITES IN THE UK Moshiri‚Äôs ownership have spent around ¬£700m on players but seen little success on the pitch. They have seen a host of managers come and go including Ronald Koeman, Sam Allardyce, Marco Silva, Carlo Ancelotti, Rafa Benitez and now Lampard. Former Leeds boss Marcelo Bielsa is the favourite to take over the Toffees as they bid to climb out of the relegation zone. More to follow.

newsArray.title: Real Madrid want Jude Bellingham in sensational swap transfer as they ‚Äòprepare offer of ¬£88m AND Eduardo Camavinga‚Äô
creator: Anthony Chapman
newsArray.content: REAL MADRID are reportedly desperate to sign Jude Bellingham ahead of Premier League rivals. And they are ready to offer ¬£88million AND Eduardo Camavinga in exchange for the Borussia Dortmund star this summer. Real Madrid are set to bid ¬£88m for Borussia Dortmund star Jude BellinghamGetty Real are also ready to offer Eduardo Camavinga as part of their bidRex Sky Germany claims Real chiefs are ready to make an offer their German counterparts can‚Äôt refuse as the race for Bellingham heats up. The England ace, 19, is one of Europe‚Äôs most sought-after players after an outstanding World Cup campaign. And Bellingham is being chased by almost all of the Premier League‚Äôs top sides to spark a major summer transfer scramble. However, Real believe they can land the teen as long as they can persuade Dortmund into accepting an offer. The Spanish champs can‚Äôt afford the reported ¬£135m price-tag, having already committed to a ¬£60m deal for 16-year-old Brazilian winger Endrick. So Real are instead plotting to bid a tasty ¬£88m fee while also handing over Camavinga in exchange. Like Bellingham, the 20-year-old France international is rated as one of the continent‚Äôs top young midfielders. However, it appears Real see Bellingham as the better long-term prospect for their ambitions. HOW TO GET FREE BETS ON FOOTBALL And they are reportedly ready to sacrifice Camavinga to get a deal over the line. The tempting swap-plus-cash proposal could be enough to twist Dortmund‚Äôs arm. It would firstly provide the Bundesliga side with an immediate like-for-like replacement. And they would also have a stunning amount of money to significantly strengthen several other areas of their squad. Most importantly, Camavinga is apparently open to the idea as well after struggling for minutes at Real this season. And on the other side of the deal, it would take a lot to dissuade Bellingham from linking up with fellow young icons like Vinicius Jr and Aurelien Tchouameni.

newsArray.title: Southampton 0-0 Newcastle LIVE: Carabao Cup semi-final clash underway as in-form Magpies and struggling Saints aim to boost chances of reaching Wembley
creator: Jack Johnson
newsArray.content: Newcastle travel to the south coast tonight to face Southampton with dreams of making it to Wembley. The Magpies haven‚Äôt been in a domestic cup final since the 1998/99 campaign, but playing the Saints over a two-legged Carabao Cup semi-final looks like a brilliant chance to end that run. The Toon have the best defensive record in the top-flight and Nick Pope hasn‚Äôt conceded a goal in his last nine games. Meanwhile, Southampton appear to have hit a bit of form under Nathan Jones and have won three of their last four as they look to return to Wembley. The Saints reached the 2016/17 Carabao Cup final but were beaten 3-2 by Manchester United. Carabao Cup semi-final first leg to kick-off at 8pm. Southampton XI: Bazunu, Walker-Peters, Lyanco, Caleta-Car, Salisu, Diallo, Alcaraz, Ward-Prowse, Djenepo, Orsic, Mara.Subs: Caballero, Bednarek, Perraud, Lavia, Maitland-Niles, Edozie, Elyounoussi, Armstrong, Adams.Newcastle XI: Pope, Trippier, Schar, Botman, Burn, Guimaraes, Longstaff, Willock, Almiron, Joelinton, Wilson.Subs: Darlow, Lascelles, Saint-Maximin, Ritchie, Lewis, Isak, Manquillo, Murphy, Anderson.talkSPORT will have live coverage from the south coast.Commentary will come from Jim Proudfoot and former West Ham forward Dean Ashton. Follow our live match blog below for regular updates‚Ä¶
